scripts.build: rm -rf dist && mkdir -p dist/assets dist/src && cp -r src/img dist/src/ && cp -r src/fonts dist/src/ && cp sections.html dist/ && cp main.js guide.js sw.js dist/ && npx tailwindcss -i src/tailwind.css -o dist/assets/main.css --minify && cp heading.css dist/assets/ && node build-inline.js
